main event: On July 7, 1952, Mr. Vincent L. Rasmussen reported observing a strange bright light hovering in the sky over his home in Osceola, Wisconsin.
interesting points: The light was estimated to be approximately one quarter to one half mile distant., The light was attached to a round, dark object of undefined size., The light changed in size and intensity, sometimes emitting rays or beams., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes., Mr. Rasmussen and several other witnesses tried unsuccessfully to photograph the object.
sighted object: a round, dark object with a bright light
witness description: Mr. Vincent L. Rasmussen described the object as a bright reddish-yellow light source hovering approximately 100 feet above the ground.
